Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 6 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika » 6.1 Paṭiccavāra » 6.1.1 Paccayānuloma » 6.1.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
3.
2815Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava, anantare tīṇi, samanantare tīṇi, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye nava, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme nava, vipāke pañca, āhāre nava…pe…  magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2816(Yathā kusalattike vibhattaṃ, evaṃ vibhajitabbaṃ.)
